title: Ep: 009 - Finding Awe in the Little Things
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design & Photography, we sit down with Corey Papadopoli, a Senior Associate at Elliott + Elliott Architecture. Our conversation touches on Corey's time spent working in Italy and how that has influenced his approach to design. We also discuss his top three most rewarding projects and his conscious choice to not have a cellphone. We really enjoyed this interview and hope you do too!
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
